final page blank.—This is the original edition of this rendering by J6n Porsteinsson, the Martyr. Berg. Mus. wrongly gives the date of it as 1661. Ambrosius Lobwasser's (i515-85) German version (in imitation of the French by Marot and Beza) from which the arguments of each psalm are taken appeared first in 1573.—FC
